messages.startupErr: Robonobo encountered an error on startup. We are sorry :-( Please file a bug report at http://robonobo.com/bugs/newticket and we will fix it ASAP.
messages.jreVersionErr: The version of Java you have is too old - but a newer one should have been installed by Robonobo! Please file a bug report at http://robonobo.com/bugs/newticket and we will fix it ASAP.
messages.launcherErr: Robonobo encountered an error while launching. We are sorry :-( Please file a bug report at http://robonobo.com/bugs/newticket and we will fix it ASAP.
